name: Wall Of Death - Demo
description:
(Note: currently only demo version is available)

10 mini games in a game!

Wall of death  is a circus attraction with athletes defying gravity. However, in this specific kind of wall of death you're not driving a motorcycle (or a car, for the most brave of us) - you are in control of a rolling ball! And the arena is not a mere cylinder...

The pace of the game is extreme - your rolling ball is perpetually propelled, so you'll need a lot of concentration (and a lot of braking) to achieve the goal, be it to to collect as many points as possible or to complete a task in the shortest time! In some of the mini games you'll have to take into account that you might fly away in space if you do not brake on time, or drop through a hole in the base if you are not rolling fast enough. And there is one mini game (most similar to the classical wall of death, by the way) that starts shrinking as soon as the game begins...

Do not worry if you are not satisfied with your performance  in the end of the day - just try your favorite mini game again tomorrow!

Explore each of the ten pieces, then find out which of the mini games suit you the most. And keep playing and getting better - there  is a leader board that will remind you how far you are from the best players!!

We wish you a lot of fun!

Mini-game titles:

MINI GAME 1: SCORE IS THE KING
MINI GAME  2: FAULTY FLOWERS
MINI GAME  3: HAIRCUTTING CORONA
MINI GAME  4: FOOT BALLS
MINI GAME  5: ATTRACTORS & SLOTS

MINI GAME  6: FREE THE BALLS
MINI GAME 7: FLYING PYRAMID
MINI GAME 8: WALL OF DEATH
MINI GAME  9: SLEEPING BEAUTIES
MINI GAME  10: FAT BOMB SLIM

[Powered by Unreal Engine 4]
